Ports

Function optimization:
Reduced gem cost for refreshing order board orders
Improved the tips for adventurer levels and activity pictorials to get rewards

Limited time event
Lost Ruins——Emma always thinks she is smart, but she cannot get out of the lost world. Can you help her out?

Limited Time Event：
New event map-Sleepy Easter

New Adventure Map:
New main line map- Mountain Temple

Home Construction:
Market-Here you can purchase all the products you want. You also can ask the store owner to bring you the specified goods.

New Function:
The first season of pass is online now-Win massive rewards through continuous mining!

Function Optimization::
1.You can claim the products of animals with one click now.
2.Added description of the products' ingredients.

Limited Time Events
New activity map——Sumer, Sky Garden

New building
Like display card-you can change the beautiful decoration of different appearances according to the number of times you are liked

New features
The waiting time for trains and freighters can be ended immediately with specific props

Function optimization
Optimized game loading speed, operation response and content display, etc.

Limited time event:
1st Anniversary Celebration

New features:
Airship Challenge—Team up with other members of the association to win Airship Coins and earn a higher rank!
Guild Store—Use Airship Coins for generous rewards!

Other optimized features:
Game loading speed and operation response
Content display

update content
Fixed advertising issues
Fixed the issue of guild challenge display

Limited time event
Christmas event

New features
Carriage Shop-Use the rhyolite obtained through the treasure map in exchange for huge prizes!
Cultivation room-Decorate the garden with hand-cultivated flowers to win weekly rewards, and you can also sell rare flowers to other players!
Clothing store-change your favorite clothing to make your adventure more comfortable.

Adjustment and optimization
Modify the gameplay of the stagecoach
Adjusted the rules of reserved tasks for Guild activities.

The adventure continues
New map——Port of Flame
New map——Smugglers Bay


Other content
Fixed known issues

Limited time event
Save cupid
Panda Village

new features
Trading House (Nurturing Room)-You can trade rare flowers and seeds cultivated with other players.
Piggy bank-every bit of your business or adventure will be accumulated, and when you need it, you can buy a lot of rewards in one go!

other
Increase the time required for automatic transfer of association presidents not online for a long time to 30 days
